mapper.insert: insert into softwareanalysis.header (warehousingId, indate, indatePerson, auditDate, reviewer, supplierNameRef) values (#{warehousingId}, #{indate}, #{indatePerson}, #{auditDate}, #{reviewer}, #{supplierNameRef})
mapper.delete: update softwareanalysis.header set indate=#{indate}, indatePerson=#{indatePerson}, auditDate=#{auditDate}, reviewer=#{reviewer}, supplierNameRef=#{supplierNameRef} where warehousingId = #{warehousingId}
